name: Ley Line Disorder: Damage Concatenation - Basic
description: When Action Phase begins: You gain 1 stack of Multiplied Damage. (DMG dealt by your characters +1; DMG further increased by 1 for each stack of Multiplied Damage; Multiplied Damage stacks up to 3 times)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> You gain 1 stack of $[C402020]. (DMG dealt by your characters +1; DMG further increased by 1 for each stack of $[C402020]; $[C402020] stacks up to 3 times)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> You gain 1 stack of Multiplied Damage. (DMG dealt by your characters +1; DMG further increased by 1 for each stack of Multiplied Damage; Multiplied Damage stacks up to 3 times)
